website_summaries.verdict: Keep your school supplies accessible but contained in this whimsically colored bin.
pros: Space for glue, pencils, crayons, scissors, craft supplies, and more
Removable bins let you take the supplies where you need them
Each section has wide opening for grab-and-go use
cons: Carousel does not rotate for easy access
May be wide for some surface areas

customer_reviews.title: It's not a lazy susan so we added one to it.
customer_reviews.text: This is terrific. Initially I had hoped to find one that's spins. But I bought this one anyway. We added a lazy Susan to it. The Lazy Susan is actually for cake decorating. It is an 11 inch lazy Susan. My dad was able to attach the pieces together. We had to grind off the center part in the bottom of the craft holder. It came out really well though. I think spinning makes this a little bit nicer because you can see all the contents easily.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: No, it doesn't spin.  Sad.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and my one and only complaint is that it doesn't spin. My mistake. I was specifically looking for a lazy susan types of storage with compartments to keep markers and pens organized for easy access when I found this. Mistakenly thought it spun, but it doesn't. Will have to purchase a separate lazy susan to compensate. Sad. It seems intuitive that you would want a spinning feature. Otherwise, I personally like the compartment sizes and the fact that each one can be removed from the tray. Those features will work for what I need -- just needs spinning to make it perfect. HINT HINT MANUFACTURER!
customer_reviews.author: cg

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this product! Bright and lovely colors makes it look great in our colorful homeschool room!
customer_reviews.author: LoveLeneva

customer_reviews.title: Durable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed for our homeschool. It does not spin so I purchased a ten inch lazy susan, also from amazon, and now I love it even more. I'm so happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Organizer
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fits all my daughters stuff. Makes things very organized. We love the look too.
customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Must-have! Buy now!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old twins and I LOVE this! They love being able to see all of their crayons/markers/ scissors, etc. I love that their coloring items are organized, look cute, and not all over our house. I was pleasantly surprised how much it holds; it fits all of our supplies perfectly. We keep ours on our Ikea shelf in the playroom, and everyone who comes over comments on now cool it is. I consider it a must-have item, and can't recommend it enough! Just buy it; you won't regret it! Edit: As many have pointed out, it doesn't spin/have Lazy-Susan featured. I personally consider that a non-issue, but you could always buy one separately, if needed :)
customer_reviews.author: MElgin

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: This thing can hold a TON!! I have so many different craft and drawing things. When it first arrived I didn't think it would hold much....I still have room!! It is pretty heavy full but I can still pick it up and move it around. My girls cannot, but that's a good thing for me 😂 I bought a 10in turntable just for ease of rotating it when it is full but pulling a compartment out that just has one thing instead of them having access to all the things is pretty smart. I recommend this on FB and most of my mom friends jumped online and snagged it too! Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute on table top
customer_reviews.text: Super cute on table top. I put on top of ikea wooden lazy Susan. Now if we can keep it organized...
customer_reviews.author: Opallouise

customer_reviews.title: Holds a large volume of supplies
customer_reviews.text: Everything I could possibly need for art projects fits in this nice organizer. The colors are bright and the plastic is thick. I put the whole thing on a Lazy Susan and now it spins. IT DOES NOT COME ROTATING. Some reviewers seemed to think it had a built-in turntable. It does not. Please don't give bad reviews for mistakes in reading the description. This is a great product. One of the wedge cups can hold at least 48 crayons or about 100+ colored pencils. You won't lack for space.
customer_reviews.author: I'm me

customer_reviews.title: pandemic Home Schooling
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what you need for home schooling during these pandemic virtual learning days. All school supplies are close at hand when you need them. Teachers get frustrated when kids have to pause their chromebook and go hunt for the right color marker, pencil, dry erase marker, scissors, glue stick, whatever. Everything is close at hand on the table. I went to 2 local teacher supply stores in my area looking for something exactly like this. Nope. This will even be great to use after return to school. Only thing that would have made this absolutely perfect is if it SWIVELED, it does not. Oh well, the inserts are easily moved around. My child loves the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Lippincott

customer_reviews.title: Best I've Found
customer_reviews.text: This is a fairly large organizer, so you need a big table, but it's great. It's about the size of a standard frozen pizza and about 5" high. I have four kids who like to color and do projects. I've tried several versions of organizers similar to this over the years and this is by far the best I have found. I like that the bins are roomy and can hold tall or short items easily, and can be removed to use just one section at a time if desired. It holds a lot, even regular-sized glue bottles and thicker paint sticks can easily fit.
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: I like the colors and the dividers, but had to place it on a lazy susan to use it
customer_reviews.text: It is bright and colorful. I have a lot of stuff that I work with on a regular basis and this allows me to sort the pens, staplers, hole punches and other office items into little colorful bins. Fortunately I already owned a lazy susan to use this on. It seems counter intuitive to make a sorting item that cannot be rotated easily. I rarely take the little bins out and just use this to place items that normally cover my desk. I like bright colors and probably wouldn't have ordered it if it was black or gray. So it is a useful item and it is fun to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara McCray

customer_reviews.title: Great idea just need design changes for kiddos
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a way to keep our 4 yr olds craft supplies ( crayons, markers, colored pencils, etc) in a confined space. First this is a strong unit material wise but way to easy for kids to knock off a craft table making a mess. A few rubber feet on the bottom would help this issue. Also designing this as a lazy Susan turn table would be amazing. I would not gift this to a young child again for those reasons. Just not a good kiddo designe.
customer_reviews.author: Firsttimedad

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful classroom organization tool!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I bought two for my class supplies and it's an amazing organizational tool. I was lucky and found two lazy Susan bottoms that were being thrown away and now it is perfect! Pro is students keep materials in order by grabbing one bin for what is needed. Fits many different items such as markers, scissors, crayons, glue, glowsticks, any tool needed in the classroom. Beautiful and bright. Con, it doesn't turn on it's own, you must purchase or find a lazy susan to place this on. Otherwise it is stationary and not as effective.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Keeps us organized
customer_reviews.text: It is much larger than I expected. The compartments are fairly large so if you’re using them for pencils or regular crayons they don’t stand up straight or stay in well unless you use multiple packs (which we don’t need for our kids but would work well for a preschool.) It’s very durable and decently made. I like that you can remove particular compartments for use instead of pulling out the whole thing at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Haymer

customer_reviews.title: Good organizer
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is cute and very spacious. It holds all of my child's markers, crayons, colored pencils, etc. with room to spare. My only wish was that there was a more secure way to keep the sections connected to the white plate besides a raised "lip". Small children are not the most coordinated, so I find myself picking up crayons that were accidentally knocked off the tray quite frequently. A lazy susan-type construction would have been a better design to prevent these spills and for added convenience while accessing each compartment. Still, it is a good product, and we are mostly happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: An Avid ReaderTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Excellent organizer for kids
customer_reviews.text: Mother of 3 kids here... we love this! It’s surprisingly larger than pics show, price is very reasonable at $17. Very giftable. Versatile- even adults can use this if you’re looking for pops of color. I love the removable feature of the cups. I can store it on the counter out of reach & carry over appropriate parts as my children need them. I’ve bought 2 of these So far, plus a third to give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: CharlieMews

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to set up “school room” at home for online learning coming fall. It is bigger than I need, but not their fault, it’s designed for classrooms accommodating more children while I only look to organize one kiddo’s workspace. However i wish there is a handle in the middle so it is portable. The minute I set up the tray he wanted to carry it around. And this is a big tray with all the compartments to balance, not easy even for an adult. I also wish it swivels especially being so big. Kid has to climb over reaching the other side of the tray.
customer_reviews.author: readersread

customer_reviews.title: Amazing supply organizer
customer_reviews.text: Great for organizing all your child's school supplies into one area for easy access. Knocked off a star bc it should have some kind of rotating base. I purchased a lazy Susan from someone else's recommendation in a review that was all black to make it rotate. I put black electrical tape on the bottom of this organizer and the top of the lazy susan to join the two so they don't separate or move and it looks great like that. Love the spaciousness of each triangular bucket and the fact you can remove each as needed for whatever craft you're working on.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Great for organizing!
customer_reviews.text: We have this sitting on our kitchen table for homeschool each day. The kids love that they can pick up individual containers and use them. I know a lot of people have commented on that there isn't a lazy susan under it, but this slides around on my table just fine. And it's hard to tell in the pictures, but the center cup is also removable.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Garrett

customer_reviews.title: We love our Classroom Craft Keeper, 10 Piece set
customer_reviews.text: Learning Resources Create-a-Space Storage Center, Bright Colors, Classroom Craft Keeper, 10 Piece set- is a must in your crafts place. Our kids love it, especially because they could remove any one compartment for their own convenience. The size is good, it fits pretty much everything we need for doing kids homework: pencils, pens, highlighters, whiteout, stapler, scissors, glue, glue sticks, etc.
customer_reviews.author: OlAvd

customer_reviews.title: Keeps stationary organized
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a stationary organizer to keep my son's stationary organized while he's learning from home. This take up very little space on his desk. It adds some fun color to his desk. Lots of slots so he can separate stationary easily. My son can see where everything is. It is easy for him to tidy up. Crayons can end up flat at the bottom of the individual cup and not easily visible. However, this works well for all other types of stationary. I would have preferred if it could swivel too. Overall good buy.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: If the tray spinner it would be perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: As most of us I have recently had to start homeschooling my children and needed a way to keep all of their supplies and his was perfect minus that it doesn’t spin which is the only reason I gave it 4 stars. It’s durable and nice quality and holds a good amount of things. Most of our preschool supplies are craft and art related so it’s great for organizing all that. I did end up just taking the cups all off the tray for storage as far fitting into our art cart but I put it all back on when I get that stuff out.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa wang

customer_reviews.title: Added a lazy susan
customer_reviews.text: Really, this should just come on a rotating base. But I liked the design enough that I bought it knowing it wouldn’t spin, and at the same time I ordered a lazy susan. Now that it rotates, it’s the best thing ever for my kids art table. We have it packed full with crayons, markers, colored pencils, glue sticks, scissors, and sharpeners. My girls use it every single day. If you do buy this, buy a cheap lazy susan to go under it. I only paid $6 for the one I got on amazon. I ran around it connecting them with clear packing tape which is invisible and works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: boyschool

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was on a lazy Susan but otherwise happy
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for organizing my kindergartener’s supplies during virtual learning. My fault for just assuming this would be a “lazy Susan” style organizer. Was very disappointed to discover it wasn’t. I attached a 10” turntable under it. Seems to be working ok (see video).
customer_reviews.author: Shopper123

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Organizing Product
customer_reviews.text: This organizer is perfect for the things we have in our homeschooling classroom (aka also our playroom) that I don't want my little ones getting into without me like their scissors, glue, markers, etc. I love that you can just pull the compartments out individually and don't have to take down the entire unit when you need something. This organizer could potentially be used for so many other things as well, and not just for classroom materials. Definitely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MamaD

customer_reviews.title: Does everything it says it will and looks nice too.
customer_reviews.text: It holds so much, keeps everything so organized and the best part is the ability to take one or two pieces off and bring them with you. For our art class we needed the markers and colored pencils, so I took an outside wedge and the inside cup. It worked perfectly. I only wish it was a Lazy Susan as well because I intend to put it on my table for my son’s use during the school year, except it doesn’t spin. So now it’s just easier to keep it at a lower eyeline.
customer_reviews.author: TeamS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size! But “carousel style” does not mean it spins!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little organizer, but the description is a bit misleading. “Carousel style” only means it’s round (I’m guessing) because it it stationery..it does not spin. I purchased a little lazy Susan for a few dollars, so it’s now retro fitted for my needs, as the holder of my second set of sewing necessities. I love that the little plastic containers are removable, and they’re easy to get things in and out. Love the colors too...they match my colorful room. Bravo!
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: I guess I should have read description better!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a lazy susan type, I guess I should have read description better!!
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this to keep all the kids art supplies organized!! No more boxes of markers, crayons, colored pencils, etc everywhere. They can pull a bin out to use or the whole caddy. Only thing I can think that would make it better is if it were lazy susan style and the caddy could spin.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Storing Arts and Crafts Tools
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this four my four year old to use since she loves doing arts and crafts. She loves using it and we both appreciate how much it is able to store. We used it to hold glue sticks/scissors, tempura paint sticks, colored pencils, markers, crayons, and stamp markers. The only thing I wish it did was turn...but despite not being to spin it, it is very nifty and saves me the trouble of having to constantly get things out for her.
customer_reviews.author: BlackKeys

customer_reviews.title: Another Learning Resources WIN
customer_reviews.text: Great product, excellent design. Only one flaw... should have made it with a lazy susan on the bottom so it spins. I bought the lazy susan someone else mentioned in the reviews and it works well. I just wish one was attached and included with the product. Holds a lot of stuff and I love that I we can take a bin out and use what we need at the desk and then return to everything else in the caddy which I keep stored inside a cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not Good for a 1st Grader School supplies
customer_reviews.text: Too, too deep for use by a 1st grader. The openings are great to fill the containers but they are way too deep for color crayons and other items being used by a child. Everything just kinda gets loss but it a great space saver if used by someone who has to have different items nearby. Pencils are really not good in the holder; nor or crayons, markers, etc. but a person who does crafts, this is a great holder and each section can hold quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Bj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for art supplies!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little art supply caddy. I purchased it to store art supplies on my toddlers' art desk. I love that I can pull off the different compartments to give each kid their own bucket of crayons. The only thing to note is that even though it is round, it does not rotate. That being said, I don't think that detracts from the overall form or function. The colors are fun, and it's the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Cupcakin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but HUGE and wish it had a turn table.
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely huge! WAYYYY bigger than I pictured it being. It's so big it takes up my children's desk, definitely not a small little pencil holder. That's my fault for not reading the description. But the quality seems pretty good. I like how the little holders are removable. Only fault is it's not a turn table, you actually have to add that so other way.
customer_reviews.author: Ajay Koleth

customer_reviews.title: Convenient organizer in fun colors
customer_reviews.text: This product provides ample room to store many often used school supplies. It makes it easy to keep a workspace clean and organized, and my children can quickly spot what they need. The one drawback is that the Lazy Susan function on mine is next to useless. Rather than easily spin at a small touch, you have to grab hold of at least two compartments and exert a great deal of force to push the units around. More often than not, something on the other side will end up pushing off of the stand. That’s why I am deducting one star.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany G.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps us Organized!
customer_reviews.text: This has been so helpful to organize all our supplies for virtual learning. Our kitchen table was covered in pencils, markers, etc, and this has helped so much to keep things in one place. You can take one section out and work in different areas and then put it all back together when you're finished. Wish we would have bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah1234

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I wish the little compartments were just a little harder to pull out for my kids. Lol! But that’s not exactly a flaw I might end up adding a little thin Velcro under each so they’ll stick a little better. This has saved my life in terms of keeping all of my daughters things organized! I had a box before but now, with everything being separated , my kids are having much more fun pulling out the crafts and creating beautiful art!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Harry

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought it'd be
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for organizing! Since it's bigger than I thought it'd be, I had to buy more school supplies to fill it up so that the crayons and markers could stand straight up. I really like this. It makes everything so organized and we're not having to dig through things just to find the right tool to do school work.
customer_reviews.author: Cin

customer_reviews.title: Close to perfect
customer_reviews.text: This item is cute with all the colors and there is an ample number of sections/containers. I love that they come out for easy access. My grip is with the inability to really use it as a turntable. When turning it, the sections easily shift and/or fall out. It does not smoothly rotate as a turntable. Close but no cigar.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Love this product! A true winner.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandkids supplies and couldn't be happier. Holds so much more than the little tub handle carriers and everything is right where you need it to be when you want it. I think it adds to creativity because children aren't frustrated looking for things and that frees up the flow to be inspired artists. Well worth the money...bought one for my daughter who "needed it" for her own household art supplies! A winner!
customer_reviews.author: Queenie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t rotate
customer_reviews.text: This is well made and very functional except for one big flaw: it doesn’t rotate. For something this size it really needs to have easy accessibility. My kids are constantly trying to turn it to whichever side we need and it’s awkward and clumsy and scratches my tabletop a bit. If it rotated it would be 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: rr521

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Bright, but not quite right!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great organizer for kids school/ crafting supplies and a part of our homeschool room. It's sturdy and bright, the only reason it doesn't get a 5 star is because it does not rotate - I thought it was like a lazy Susan and spun around - unfortunately it does not, it is stationary. If it moved around, it would have got 5 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: Country_Soul

customer_reviews.title: Kids storage center
customer_reviews.text: I really like this storage container, bright colors, easy to use and clean, the kids loved it, the only thing I was not happy with was the turn table they recommended to use with it, the idea was great, but the turn table does not fit correctly, the storage container was to big to fit on the turn table and slides off
customer_reviews.author: DeLee

customer_reviews.title: Holds tons of stuff needs a lazy susan
customer_reviews.text: This is a great organizer for all the stuff that kids like to draw, glue or stamp with. I totally agree with other reviews that it would be much better if a lazy susan was attached to be able to spin it around. It’s well worth purchasing with a little extra $ outlay foe a lazy soon its just about perfect.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: heads' up, this does not turn
customer_reviews.text: Because it's described as a "carousel style" organizer, I thought it would turn. I was wrong. The organizer is static, but is otherwise great. There's lots of space in the cubbies for stuff, and the cubbies are removable/can be individually cleaned when my kiddo inevitably gets crud in them.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kapalla

customer_reviews.title: Best crafting tool!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely LOVES this organizer! She's only 6, but is big time into crafting. So we purchased this for her to help keep her desk a little more organized and clean. She thinks it's the best ever. She loves that there is a place for all of her essentials, and the fact that it spins makes it even better. She can easily get to all of her supplies without rummaging through piles of crafting stuff!
customer_reviews.author: R. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Don’t love but it works
customer_reviews.text: This product would be so much better if it was a lazy susan. I like that the Individual trays come out but they can be a little unsteady because of this feature.
customer_reviews.author: WN

customer_reviews.title: Great Small Tool Storage For Jewelry Bench
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever searched through the pile of stuff on your workbench and wondered where the devil those small needle-nosed pliers went - probably somewhere under all of those other tools on your work surface? Well, I have hundreds of times. This storage device works and has eliminated, "where the devil" are those ________s? I purchased a lazy susan to go under each of the two I purchased to make them easier to get to things in each bin. I now have two of these beauties on my desk and it's the perfect solution.
customer_reviews.author: David Stancel

customer_reviews.title: It holds a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some kind of storage tray to organize school supplies for my twins who are starting Kindergarten this year. They are learning remotely at home, and this is perfect for keeping our “classroom” (i.e. kitchen dining area) tidy. It was actually a little larger than I expected, and it’s perfect for keeping their things organized but available to them as needed. I’m very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: M. Bibeau

customer_reviews.title: Writing Center Organization
customer_reviews.text: I teach 1st grade and used this to store my writing center materials including flare pens, highlighters, expo markers, note cards, post it notes, pencils and more. I love that I can pull the little containers apart and that the cups are perfectly sized. So far it is holding up to 20 6-7 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: TeacherMom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for organizing school supplies !!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for organizing our school supplies for online school !! Each kid has its own cubby for scissors/glue etc and then we have communal markers and crayons. Perfect size, sturdy! Only thing that would improve it would be if it would turn, but it doesn’t bother us much !
customer_reviews.author: L. Mastrigt

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend especially for homeschooling/remote learning/virtual learning!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this last March when we started homeschooling for remote learning. During school days we use this all day! It has held up great and we're excited to use it again for virtual learning this next school year. It holds so much and keeps it so well organized.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Moms get one
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for all the craft stuff placed in plastic bags and wanting to organize. It's already put together and the size is amazing! Worth the price!! I intend on having my eye on this thing 24/7 so itll last a long time. I believe this to be a giftable item and would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: William & wife

customer_reviews.title: Great for arts and crafts
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our arts and crafts corner, easily accessible for the kids, and I bought a cheap lazy susan to set it on as well. We love that you can pick up each section as well, so if we only need markers we can set that closer to us on the desk, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Fleming

customer_reviews.title: wish it were more sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Large but not sturdy. The individual pieces come out too easily. Wish it had a lazy susan spinner on the bottom. It's ok.
customer_reviews.author: bb

customer_reviews.title: You need this for remote learning/homeschooling!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this after many months of remote learning and it had been great. It brought some excitement for my young child who personally arranged all the items to go into this to his liking. We also bought one for our playroom for crafts/makers and it has been great.
customer_reviews.author: JMS

customer_reviews.title: One-stop organization for creative kids.
customer_reviews.text: This is the answer! As a mother of a crafty-coloring five year old I needed an easily accessible one-stop spot for all her creative needs. This fulfilled all my needs. It is neat and compact. It has a permanent spot on my island and my five year old keeps the compartments so neat. She spins it to make her selection. Markers for today’s project! This item has allowed her the independence she craves and me, I run to retrieve snacks only now. No more demands for crayons, scissors, glue etc. She’s gets them all herself from her spinning coral.
customer_reviews.author: rvb

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my kids organized!
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of this. I do wish it had a lazy susan option. I read a review before I bought it that said you can turn it into 1 if you want. I might just do that. It's not terribly inconvenient spinning it on a smooth surface. My kids just grab whichever section they need at that moment.
customer_reviews.author: See2121

customer_reviews.title: Hope they make one 1/2 the size of this.
customer_reviews.text: Probably my fault for not measuring the table first, but it's the only one like this that I could find. We are using it on a 4'x2' kids table (for two) and its huge...just wish it was half the size. I also thought it would spin, but doesn't. It would be better on a regular size table (6'x4').
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It is affordable, fun and makes organizing easy. I went to Michaels and did not like what they had on the shelves plus it was 3 times the price. I love that this products compartments can detach and it’s easy to clean. The item itself stands still but I purchased a separate item so that it can turn (seen it on a previous review). Very satisfied with this purchase. I highly recommend! Most of all my kids enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisette O.

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I’ve been struggling with my kids constantly going into our drawer grabbing these supplies and just making a mess. This is so much easier and great that they can see what color they are grabbing. Wish it could spin but that’s ok
customer_reviews.author: B Schw

customer_reviews.title: Fair price
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of the product. The removable bins and the lazy Susan style mechanics. I don’t like the quality of the material. It’s a very brittle and somewhat thin plastic. It seems like it’d break or chip easily if a child accidentally dropped it (which is likely in a classroom of little people). We’ll see how it holds up by the end of the year
customer_reviews.author: THLow

customer_reviews.title: Big. Does not rotate.
customer_reviews.text: I sooooo wish it turned.... I will have to buy a lazy susan and keep that underneath. It is surely bigger than my expectations. But I don't know how I just assumed that such a set will be turnable, I was bumped. I should have done better research on the product before putting money into it.
customer_reviews.author: Umm Ruqaiya

customer_reviews.title: Does not spin! But trays are removable
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed this does not spin... i guess I should have read the details better... but it’s functional & for the price it should spin. If I had time to wait I would have returned it for the other one that’s similar in price but actually spins!!!
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to our homeschooling room. It’s easy for little hands to take the section with the desired items (scissors, markers, etc). It looks neat. I’d buy it again. The only con is that it doesn’t rotate but I added a lazy susan tray and that solved it (a suggestion from another reviewer)
customer_reviews.author: Doggie mommy

customer_reviews.title: Large storage with great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are PERFECT! Great for organizing craft/ school supplies. I wish it had a turn table bottom, but these are a large size and all of the cups can come off! Great material and I'm really happy with my purchase! Each colored cup can fit 3 full bottles of glue, or even almost 100 crayons! Will be using these to keep our homeschool supplies organized! Great for the price and I like to get everything on the cheap lol.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Savage

customer_reviews.title: Great Distance Learning / Homeschool Organizers
customer_reviews.text: I am really thrilled with this product as it quickly helped me create a supply station for my Kindergartener who is doing virtual distance/homeschooling this year. I love that it rotates and that the various buckets can be removed individually.
customer_reviews.author: nomadnoor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all your kiddos crafting tools.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is in kindergarten and this is perfect for all her little craft tools. It fits nicely on her little desk and it’s easy for her to reach for the items she needs. This would be even better if it actually moved like a lazy Susan and if the little containers were a little taller. I found that all her markers and pencils aren’t as secure as I’d like. Other than that, it’s great! Also got it fairly quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Fox

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. The containers are a little deep for regular crayons but I put some foam in the bottom of the container & it propped them up enough. Although this product doesn't spin, I bought a lazy susan to add that feature myself.
customer_reviews.author: KA

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: This product has cleaned up my daughter’s desk. I was able to organize items that the kids don't keep on their tables so they constantly need my help getting. With this the items like scissors glue makers colored pencils post it's high lighters are all out and visible and if one table needs a particular item they are able to get to it quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: J.J

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for homeschool set up
customer_reviews.text: We are doing remote school for the first part of the year at least and my kiddo is in elementary school where they frequently use a ton of art products. This helps keep everything together and organized....well as organized as an 8 year old will let it. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Lucas

customer_reviews.title: A must for the craft room
customer_reviews.text: I got this to finally try to organize my kid's craft room. It's a nice size and fits much more than I thought it would. The only downside is that it doesn't turn, which I knew before I bought it but that would make this even better.
customer_reviews.author: ErinR

customer_reviews.title: Cute & convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed for my kid's craft cabinet. It organized everything we had and then some. It's also super cute and convenient since you can just take whichever part you want without having to pull the whole thing out
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Virtual school organizer
customer_reviews.text: This has been a wonderful addition to our virtual schooling area at home. Everything is organized, and my kindergartner can find everything he needs quickly. I love that the little wedges are removable too, so when I need to take the markers or crayons to entertain his 3 year old brother, I can.
customer_reviews.author: Kre8tivChik

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter gave it thumbs up!!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves it. It’s sturdy enough to hold glue bottles,paints, scissors and a ton of other things. It’s nice because you can visualize all the supplies and it is made of colorful durable material. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Javelina

customer_reviews.title: Missing Pieces
customer_reviews.text: Says it’s a ten piece set - but I received one without the middle white cup. I feel taken advantage of having paying what I did for this. Otherwise it’s a great set - just going to have an empty wasted middle spot now. Maybe next time SAY it’s missing something. Annoyed and frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff Morg

customer_reviews.title: just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: with schools doing online schooling, i needed something to hold the variety of school supplies my kids will need to learn and grow at home. so much space to hold everything they need and very colorful.
customer_reviews.author: Booklover Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great storage solution!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this storage caddy! It’s spacious but also saves so much room. I like that the bins come out so I can disburse materials if needed. I added picture labels to the outside of each bin and a lazy susan to the bottom and it turned out perfect for my classroom writing center.
customer_reviews.author: smchenr

customer_reviews.title: Awsome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. The only reason I gave it four stars is that I had to modify it myself as some other reviews also said. I added a lazy Susan to the bottom of it. So my kids can turn it around for easy access.
customer_reviews.author: Ghazal Shamsian

customer_reviews.title: Holds more then you expect!
customer_reviews.text: This thing holds A LOT! Way more then I expected I almost had trouble filling it but then it ended up being the perfect size to hold supplies for my two kids. Very well made and durable easy to clean. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this organizer!! It has been great for the kids while doing their homework, and now comes in handy during the quarantine. The sections are removable, so if one child wants to use crayons, you just remove that section.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I like that the compartments come apart so you can just bring one of them with you to use and work with at a time. The colors are nice. Quality is as you'd expect and exactly as advertised. I am very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Love

customer_reviews.title: Great storage that looks good, too!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful storage and so colorful and automatically interesting to any toddler. Slightly big and the pens get caught in the handles for each container. Wish some containers were glued and not all interchangable but in all great item and quality. 4* hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Too large, but great concept.
customer_reviews.text: Was bigger than I thought so ended up not able to use- didn’t fit the space I was going to store it. Also thought it might be more like a lazy Susan base. Donated it to a preschool teacher for the classroom. If you have a big enough space to keep it at, would work great.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: So Helpful!
customer_reviews.text: With the distance learning, this is such a life saver! Everything my child could need for school activities is organized in one spot. We don’t have to go look for glue sticks, counters, pencils, or markers. They’re all there! The only thing that could make it better is if it were a lazy Susan.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle E Sapp

customer_reviews.title: Really great
customer_reviews.text: Lots of room, nice and colorful, durable, a really good organizer, the only thing I would change is to make it turn like on a lazy susan but other than that it is perfect. Would reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great for my classroom
customer_reviews.text: This is a Godsend for me. I teach I work with first grade children who need reading intervention. Almost all of our work is "hands-on" at a large table in my room. This carousel holds so many of the items I need in the moment. I LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: TCH2RD2

customer_reviews.title: Great caddy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little caddy! It has plenty of room for all supplies. It doesn't spin, but I feel as though the price makes up for it. It's so nice to have all kids supplies in one container.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great for schools/home
customer_reviews.text: (Home use) I love this It’s nice to just pull it out and put it on the center of the table and that my kids pick their container. I also like that I can just pull out the pencils and nothing else if I want to limit what they can use . My only wish is that it spun, cant get everything we want .
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: This has been great for our child. It allows us to organize all of her craft items (colors, markers, stickers...). These are great because you can grab just one section of the bundle and bring it to where its needed. They are sturdy and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Added a lazy susan to make it rotating
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. I added a 10 inch lazy susan under it, and it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: La mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Craft Organizer
customer_reviews.text: We love this organizer for my daughters art supplies. Its perfect for keeping everything separated and makes clean up easy. We like that you can take out the little containers and just bring what we are using to the table. The only thing that would make it better is if it turned.
customer_reviews.author: Jrosenow

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter lives her desk organizer. It looks really good on her table and she can find everything herself instead of asking an adult to get it for her. Great organizer for a 6 year old. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Brown

customer_reviews.title: Will totally tell everyone about this!
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived! I had all the supplies my 3 kids needed ready to load it up! It is perfect for home school supply sharing! My very much different opinion children actually all agreed it was awesome ☺️
customer_reviews.author: April Lynne Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Great but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Bought four -one per K table. Needs a handle or lazy Susan too get my 5 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as expected. The bottom is scratchy so I don’t want to put it on my table. I’d liked to have the containers be the six basic colors instead of random.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, smart design. I just wish it turned like a lazy susan.
customer_reviews.author: Gohan74

customer_reviews.title: Great turntable
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE to draw, and our kitchen table is always covered in markers and crayons. This has helped keep things orderly for the most part, but they often don't clean up after themselves. It's great that it spins so there aren't any more arguments to pass something to someone.
customer_reviews.author: Alli S.

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my sons activity/craft table. I surprised him with it on his 2nd bday and he really enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Stevana J Dalgard

product_meta.title: Learning Resources Create-a-Space Storage Center, Homeschool Storage, Fits 3oz Hand Sanitizer Bottles, Bright Colors, Classroom Craft Keeper, 10 Piece set
product_meta.description: Encourage your students to be creative by creating the perfect tabletop makerspace. Handy Create-a-Space Storage Center makes it easier and more convenient to keep your materials organized and stored away. Includes a 12" tray with 8 colorful containers. This is a great item for teachers looking for extra ways to organize! Ages 3 and up
feature_bullets: DESK STORAGE: All-in-one storage center features all the space you need to keep your classroom, playroom or office clutter free.
MULTIFUNCTIONAL SPACE SAVER: Carousel-style storage center comes with eight removable containers sized for glue sticks, colored pencils, and more.
GRAB & GO: Each removable container comes with an easy-to-hold handle, so you can always grab the materials you need.
PROMOTE CLEANLINESS & ORGANIZATION: Big enough to hold your kids' supplies, or hand sanitzer bottles for germ free hands. Each container measures 4.5" wide x 4" tall.
DURABLE & HIGH QUALITY: Containers rest within a sturdy circular tray complete with center storage space. Tray measures 12" in diameter

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars3,074 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
